com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerview.Adapter

Class ExpandableRecyclerAdapterHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryanbrooks.expandablerecyclerview.Adapter.ExpandableRecyclerAdapterHelper

  • public class ExpandableRecyclerAdapterHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    Helper class to wrap Parent Objects and handle expansion and stable ids.

      • ExpandableRecyclerAdapterHelper

        public ExpandableRecyclerAdapterHelper(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> itemList)
        Public constructor. Takes in list of all objects and generates a list of helper items that wrap the parent objects. See generateHelperItemList() for how items are wrapped.
        Parameters:
        itemList -

      • generateHelperItemList

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Object> generateHelperItemList(java.util.List<java.lang.Object> itemList)
        Method used to generate Helper objects. Takes in a list of the original items and generates a stable id along with setting the expanded state of the item.
        Parameters:
        itemList -
        Returns:
        ArrayList of wrapped ParentObjects and the original child objects
